sub_title: Commercial Director | Public Speaker | Published Author
summary:
Public speaking on topics relating to my two professional hobbies: #offshore energy and #sales. Audiences all over the world have enjoyed motivational and inspirational sessions hosted by myself. On stage, I talk commerce and energy!!

One-on-one, people value my commercial coaching. How to deal with your clients in B2b sales environments during every step of the customer journey. From prospecting to negotiation and referrals, there is a lot of knowledge and experience to share. Invite me to your next sales meeting or for a consultative session.

#Sales Pro ♠ #Executive coach ♠ #Public Speaker ♠ Published author

Let me help you grow your business. Currently, involved in the offshore industry growing Conbit's business as part of the Mammoet group. I like to get challenged by you, so please send me a connection invite with a personal note.

I am an ambitious and innovative Global Commercial Sales Professional with over 15 years of achievement in defining comprehensive business/marketing strategies that drive growth, profitability, and company value. Throughout my career, I have become an expert at managing all aspects of international territories and identifying potential opportunities in unprecedented markets, within the oil and gas, renewable, and chemical industries, to propel a business to exponential development. 

I believe the key to success is being able to foster and cultivate key partnerships with stakeholders and clients and identifying their direct needs in order to devise compelling sales solutions to achieve long-term business goals. With these sales techniques, I have managed to establish and negotiate various client contracts (EPC, EPCI, EC, turnkey, SLA, etc.) with all of the major oil and gas companies (operators and EPC contractors) across five different continents. 

My experience and qualifications allow me to mentor and train global teams in all aspects of international sales to large accounts:
-	Sales process and techniques
-	Ability to negotiate on contractual and legal matters
-	Online and offline marketing strategies
-	Establish and maintain budgets and forecasts

In addition, I pride myself on being able to build strong, robust sales teams around the world who consistently exceed sales quotas and company standards. Recently, I published a book titled "Industrial Sales - A Roadmap to Increase Your Sales Globally" in which I detail how to successfully sell to large companies. 

If you would like to connect or know more about my story, please send me an In Mail message or email me at bramvanoischot @ hotmail.com.

Reach out to me to learn more.

My professional resume, so you know with whom you are dealing. 

I am proud to be ambitious. My next role is all about creating more value for B2B clients working in an international environment, in which complex commercial processes for the challenge of my sales teams.

treasury_media.title: Bram van Oirschot
treasury_media.description: Amazon.com's Bram van Oirschot Author Page.

treasury_media.title: Memorable Project: Multi-Million Flare Revamp Project
treasury_media.description:
In 2009 I traveled to the island of Curacao many times to convert a flare opportunity into a contract. The contract was awarded at the end of 2009 and the project was in execution for a period of 1.5 years.

When I look back at this period, I am proud of the accomplishment in the spring of my career. At the age of 27 commercial freedom was given to convince the client, which was a subsidiary of the Venezuelan  company PDVSA.

treasury_media.title: Memorable Project: Offshore Libya
treasury_media.description:
Doing business in Libya during the political turmoil involving the Khadaffi family brought some challenges. The experience goes beyond professionalism. It involves personal relationships with people that face personal challenges every day.

The legal and financial challenges were imminent. I needed to align the possibilities of the client with the risk profile of my employer.

#Total #Libya #Offshore

treasury_media.title: Project: Implementation CRM system
treasury_media.description:
I believe strongly in the use of a good CRM system. You can track what you are doing. The actions you take will benefit the organization, since all information is stored. Without a CRM system most market knowledge remains at the individual sales person. 

I coordinated the selection, implementation and maintenance of a new CRM system. We selected SugarCRM, because it can be easily modified to meet the company specific business process.

projects.title: Total E&P Nederland - Lifting Living Quarters K6-P platfom by Conbit
projects.description:
During the summer of 2012, Conbit lifted its heaviest load ever. To lift accommodation units on the K6-P platform of Total E&P Nederland BV, Conbit used an aluminium lifting construction. This unconventional method for lifting a load exceeding 40 tonnes saved using a heavy crane vessel. By completing this challenging project, Conbit proved the effectiveness of special lifting techniques. In total, approximately 120 metric tonnes were lifted during three main jobs.

Conbit moves boundaries in offshore lifting with Aluminium

profile_positions.description: Grow Conbit, build a great team, and have fun!!
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
My two main responsibilities:
✔️ Help my team get better in serving clients.
✔️ Help clients all over the world to execute their challenging projects.

🔥 It's that simple 🔥

My team: 3 sales managers, 2 business development managers, 1 business development representative, 1 cost estimator, 1 marketing coordinator and 2 sales interns. Located and serving clients all over the world. True "solution selling" experts focused on helping clients.

The clients: Typically project, shutdown, maintenance or construction managers from offshore operators request our support for their lifting challenges. 

Contact me: 📧 bo @ conbit.nl, or 📞 +31 6 1881 7190

Recruited to establish, build and oversee the entire sales department for the company to promote growth and maximize profits; facilitated the business's growth from a EUR 1Mio engineering company to a EUR 10Mio global full-service contractor  

Devise innovative marketing strategies, proposals, and a clear vision to propel the company into unprecedented global markets; develop performance goals, define budgets, and forecast upcoming sales trends

Establish and manage an international sales team of eight; onboard and train new hires 1:1 on exceptional sales techniques and opportunity management skills

Cultivate key partnerships with businesses; established and negotiated annual client contracts across five different continents with major oil companies

Oversaw the entire sales integrations after the company merger with ALE Heavylift and later Mammoet

Implemented an innovative CRM system to streamline business processes and workflows

Integrated a legal awareness within the company; composed contracts and ensured legal compliance.
profile_positions.title: Manager Sales | Guiding a team of commercial professionals to excellent performance

profile_positions.description:
As part of the Actuant Corporation, Hydratight NL is serving the Dutch industrial markets. The small team is responsible to rent out and sell bolting and onsite machining equipment

Oversaw the entire Netherland's sales territory for flange services to the chemical and petroleum plants

Consulted with clients directly and provided product service solutions that met their exact business needs and goals
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Company services: Specialized maintenance in the Oil and Gas Industry. Flare tip replacements, flare maintenance, special lifting, etc.

Traveled around the world identifying potential business opportunities in unparallel markets for the oil and gas industry; acquired new accounts and closed on multi-million dollar international contracts

Oversaw all sales outside the Netherlands and Belgium; increased international turnover from EUR 500K to EUR 4Mio

Developed and executed an oil and gas initiative to migrate services to an offshore platform and reduce operational costs
